1: <pb/><e>Aton sb'it vin̈aj David ix sb'itej ayic ix tumaj vin̈ yuj vin̈aj Natán schecab' Dios, yujto ix yic' ix Betsabé vin̈ yetb'eyumoc.</e> <pb/><t>Ach in Diosal yujto tzin a xajanej, oc'oc val a c'ool d'ayin. A yuj a nivan oq'uelc'olal, sucsat in mul.</t>
2: <t>B'ic in el d'a masanil in mul, tzin a sacb'itani.</t>
3: <t>Yel toni ix och in mul, ix in ec' d'a yib'an̈, max b'atlaj satc'olal junoc rato in mul chi' vuuj.</t>
4: <t>Ix och val in mul chi' d'ayach. Ix in c'ulej chucal d'a yol a sat. Yuj chi' smoj val ac'an in yaelal. Max yal-laj yalchaj chucal d'ayach ayic tzin a ch'olb'itani.</t>
5: <t>Val yel, yictax valjub'al chuc in. Toxonton chuc in atax yic cuchb'il into och yuj ix in nun.</t>
6: <t>Val yel tza xajanej mach sgana tojolal d'a smasanil sc'ool. Yuj chi' ac' a jelanil d'ayin.</t>
7: <t>N̈iccanel in mul yic tzin sacb'icaneli. B'ic in eli, yic vach' sacxon̈ej tzin ajcan icha q'uen sacb'acom.</t>
8: <t>Ac'xi in tzalajc'olal in c'ana' yic tz'el in cusc'olal yuj b'aj ix ac' in yaelal sic'lab'il.</t>
9: <t>Man̈xo a nacot in mul chi', tza sucan sat masanil in chucal.</t>
10: <t>Ach in Diosal, tojolb'itej in pensar. A junoc ac' b'eyb'al tzac' d'ayin yic tzin c'anab'ajej yed' smasanil in c'ool.</t>
11: <t>Man̈ in ic'canel d'a ichan̈, man̈ ic'paxel a Santo Espíritu d'ayin.</t>
12: <t>Ac'xi in tzalajc'olal yuj in colnab'il. Ac' vip yic b'ecan in c'ool ach in c'anab'ajani,</t>
13: <t>yic vach' tzin c'ayb'ej eb' chuc yic sb'eyb'alej a b'eyb'al eb' yic smeltzajoch eb' d'a yol a c'ab'.</t>
14: <t>Ach in Diosal, ix ac' in colnab'il, man̈xo a cha in mil anima, colinel d'a in mul yic ol valan a tojolal d'a b'italil.</t>
15: <t>Mamin, jac in ti' yic ol ach in b'itani.</t>
16: <t>Tato a ofrenda, ma silab' n̈usb'il tza nib'ej, tzam vac'laj, ocxo jun, max a nib'ej paxlaj.</t>
17: <t>A tas a gana, aton eb' scus sc'ol yuj smul. Ach in Diosal, max a patiquejel-laj anima syiq'uem sb'a yujto sna sb'a yuj smul.</t>
18: <t>Ac' a vach'c'olal d'a Sion. Yuj svach'il a c'ool, b'oxiq'ue smuroal Jerusalén.</t>
19: <t>Ichato val chi' d'a tzalajc'olal ol aj a chaan silab' a gana tz'ac'ji d'ayach, aton noc' noc' sn̈usji. Ichato chi' ol ac'joc noc' vacax silab'il d'ayach d'a altar.</t>
